actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction in determining the taxable estate of an individual for one-half the proceeds from sales by such individual of employer securities to employee stock ownership plans or certain worker-owned cooperatives.
short_title: Employee Stock Ownership Improvement Act of 1984

summary.text: Employee Stock Ownership Improvements Act of 1984 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from the gross estate of an individual of 50 percent of the aggregate proceeds received from the sale of employer securities to employee stock ownership plans or qualified worker-owned cooperatives.

titles.title: Employee Stock Ownership Improvement Act of 1984

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction in determining the taxable estate of an individual for one-half the proceeds from sales by such individual of employer securities to employee stock ownership plans or certain worker-owned cooperatives.
